SELECT B.BOARDNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENTS, B.USERID, CNT, B.FAVORITE, B.KIND, DECODE( TO_CHAR(B.CDATETIME,'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(B.CDATETIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(B.CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) AS CDATE, COUNT(C.BOARDNO) AS COMMENTCOUNT FROM TBL_BOARD B LEFT JOIN TBL_COMMENT C ON B.BOARDNO = C.BOARDNO WHERE 1=1
AND ( TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR B.USERID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND B.USERID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND B.KIND = #{kind}
GROUP BY B.BOARDNO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENTS, B.USERID, CNT, B.FAVORITE, B.KIND, DECODE( TO_CHAR(B.CDATETIME,'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(B.CDATETIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(B.CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
ORDER BY BOARDNO
ORDER BY TITLE
ORDER BY CNT DESC
ORDER BY CDATE
ORDER BY COMMENTCOUNT DESC
OFFSET #{page} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
